text: Hi all, my name is Kimberly. I’m new to HubSpot CMS and figuring out how all of it works, I’m currently taking the HubSpot developer’s certification program and been dealing with so many bugs mainly related to npm with my linux terminal on my chromebook and powershell terminal on windows. It’s been a rough road but slowly getting the hang of it.

Hi @here curious if folks here are using chatgpt in their day to day sales activities? Is it safe to pass deal information since I'm not sure if it would create some data privacy problems later for our company?

Thanks for the info. I’m not entirely clear on this… When a CMS editor creates a page in the CMS (in the case of breadcrumb) I need to automatically get the page title and URL of the parent pages.

Not sure how HubDB fits in? Are you saying that CMS editors need to enter the page titles in HubDB manually? Do they also need to add the URL of the parent page manually to HubDB?
